subject: Attention: Beneficiary
body:
Attention: Beneficiary
This is to inform you that the United Nation (UN) and World health Organization,(WHO) Unicef, has map out the total sum of USD$1.5million United States dollars as a means of Covid-19 Parliative to all citizenry,If you received this email have it in mind that your email was selected by our random machine.
Therefore, You are to respond back to this email with immediate effect to enable us to proceed with the processing of your fund release by the stated organization.
Full Name..............
Home/Office address
Phone/fax..................
marital status..........
copy of your ID.
Regard,
Mr.Raymond Jackson
World Health Organization
Cor-dinator

subject: Re:   Attention: Beneficiary
body:
Hello Jackson,

Thank you for your email. It's quite exciting to hear about this initiative by the United Nations, World Health Organization, and UNICEF. I'm curious to know more about it.

Could you please provide more details on how this program works? How was my email selected and what is the purpose of these funds?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Laverne

subject: Re: Attention: Laverne
body:
Attention: Laverne

This is to inform you that the United Nation (UN) and World health
Organization,(WHO) Unicef, has map out the total sum of USD$1.5million
United States dollars as a means of Covid-19 Parliative, Scam victims, to

was selected by our random machine.

Therefore, You are to respond back to this email with immediate effect to

copy of your ID.

Regard,

Mr.Raymond Jackson

subject: Re: Attention: Laverne
body:
Hello Jackson,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information. It's quite interesting to hear about the efforts of the United Nations, World Health Organization, and UNICEF. I'm curious to know more about how this program works.

Could you please explain a bit more about how my email was selected by your random machine? Also, what is the process for releasing these funds?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Laverne

subject: Re: Attention: Laverne
body:
Attention: Laverne

Your mail is well noted, having gone through your mail, i noticed that you
have not filled the requested form. It is very important that you fill out
the form to enable us to proceed with the process.

Like I said earlier your email was randomly selected by our machine, and
also to inform you that this program is set out as  parliative for
Covid-19, scam victims or unpaid funds from the federal or state level
within the circle of the afro-mentioned organizations.

Note: once you re-confirm your stated information, we will direct you to
the department that is in-charge of your payment.

I shall wait to hear from you as soon as possible.

Full Name..............
Home/Office address
Phone/fax..................
marital status..........
copy of your ID.

Regard,

Mr.Raymond Jackson
World Health Organization
Cor-dinator

<http://www.avg.com/email-signature?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
Virus-free.www.avg.com
<http://www.avg.com/email-signature?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
<#DAB4FAD8-2DD7-40BB-A1B8-4E2AA1F9FDF2>

subject: Re: Attention: Laverne
body:
Hello Jackson,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite interesting to hear that my email was randomly selected by your machine. Could you please explain a bit more about how this selection process works? I'm curious to know.

Also, could you provide more details about this program? You mentioned it's set out as parliative for scam victims or unpaid funds from the federal or state level. How does this work exactly?

I noticed that you've requested some personal information such as home address, phone number, marital status and a copy of my ID. I'm sorry but I don't feel comfortable sharing these details over email. Is there another way we can proceed with the process without me having to share these details?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Laverne

subject: Re: Attention: Laverne
body:
Attention: Laverne

Thank you so much for a quick reply. Without wasting much time, let me
quickly answer some of your vital questions, because I have so much work on
my desk that needs attention.

This program has been going on for years, and I am sure you have been
contacted over this program for some months.I am glad you finally respond
to us because we are gradually coming to the end of submission of entries.
Your information is very important because what we are doing here is
transparent, your information is needed because it will be on the list that
has received their payment, and it will be shortlisted to our payment
portal showing that you have received your fund.Your data is safe and
secure, and it will not be shared to any third party.

This program was jointly initiated by all the mentioned organizations as a
means to eradicate poverty, compensate those that have lost their had
earned money,covid-19 etc. so far we have achieved 89.6% of this program.
Therefore, we are gradually coming to the end of it, so it is time you
follow up or comply with the directives given to you.

I shall wait to hear from you as soon as possible.

Full Name..............
Home/Office address
Phone/fax..................
marital status..........
copy of your ID.

Regard,

Mr.Raymond Jackson
World Health Organization
Cor-dinator

<http://www.avg.com/email-signature?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
Virus-free.www.avg.com
<http://www.avg.com/email-signature?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
<#DAB4FAD8-2DD7-40BB-A1B8-4E2AA1F9FDF2>

subject: Re: Attention: Laverne
body:
Hello Jackson,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's really interesting to hear about this program and its noble cause of eradicating poverty and compensating those who have lost their hard-earned money. I'm curious, how many people have benefited from this program so far? 

Also, could you please explain a bit more about the process? How does my information help in achieving the goals of this program?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Laverne

subject: Re: Attention: Laverne
body:
Attention: Laverne

In response to your last mail, like i said before now that we have achieved
89.6% out of the 100% of list of names we have in our data based system. so
when you analyses it, you will be able to figure out the number of
person(s) that has received their payment so far.

Your information is a starting point toward the process, and your
information will be shortlisted to our portal or in our payroll, it will be
quickly accessed by the paying bank.

I think i have already answered all your question.

I shall wait to hear from you as soon as possible.

Full Name..............
Home/Office address
Phone/fax..................
marital status..........
copy of your ID.

Regard,

Mr.Raymond Jackson
World Health Organization
Cor-dinator

subject: Re: Attention: Laverne
body:
Hello Jackson,

Thank you for your prompt response. It's great to hear that many people have already received their payments. I'm eager to understand more about this process.

Could you please explain a bit more about how the portal or payroll system works? And how does the paying bank access it?

Also, I'm curious about the information you requested. Could you clarify why these details are necessary for the process?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Laverne

subject: Re: Attention: Laverne
body:

subject: Re: Attention: Laverne
body:
Hello Jackson,

Good day to you! I hope you're doing well. 

I understand that you're quite busy and I appreciate your patience with me. I'm just trying to fully comprehend the process, so please bear with me.

However, I'm a bit hesitant about providing the information you've asked for. Could you kindly explain why these details are necessary? Also, could we possibly proceed without sharing such personal information?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Laverne
